# AVExperienceController.ExpandedConfiguration

**Structure**

A structure that specifies options for an expanded experience.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ExpandedConfiguration
```

## Overview

It’s valid to transition to this experience even when the original container isn’t in a view hierarchy. In this case, you must specify a [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVExperienceController/ExpandedConfiguration/fallbackPlacement] or the transition result is [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVExperienceController/TransitionContext/TransitionResult/reversed(reason:)].

## Creating an expanded configuration

- **init(fallbackPlacement:)**: Creates a configuration object for an expanded experience.

## Specifying placement

- **fallbackPlacement**: A fallback placement to use when the original container isn’t in the view controller hierarchy.
- **AVExperienceController.ExpandedConfiguration.Placement**: A structure that represents where the video will be experienced.

## Instance Properties

- **automaticTransitionToImmersive**: The expanded experience automatic transition behavior for the immersive experience.

## Enumerations

- **AVExperienceController.ExpandedConfiguration.AutomaticTransitionToImmersive**: The expanded experience automatic transition behavior into the immersive experience.

## Configuring experiences

- **expanded**: Configuration options for an expanded experience.
